ApplicationData.text: ASPRO 2 Configuration Module to describe supported interferometers and their instruments.

prerelease.change: VLTI: added eso Period 97 = 96
Added timezone identifier to every interferometer
VLTI: fixed quadruplets and delay lines for Period 96 (PIONIER) and Future (MATISSE, GRAVITY)
VLTI: modified the PIONIER instrument in Period 96 to define its new setup (instrumental modes = GRISM-H, FREE-H)
VLTI: use 2 switchyards (VCM and STS) to respectively have the DL restrictions due to VCM pressure limits (before Period 96) and no DL restrictions with STS (Period 96 and Future)
VLTI: added eso Period 96 (AMBER + PIONIER only)
VLTI: disable the DL restrictions due to VCM pressure limits as the STS (star separator / dual feed) should correct properly the pupill
CHARA: Added a preliminary setup for the new FRIEND instrument
Added Paranal and sutherland sites: observability only for single-telescope observations
VLTI: refined DL maximum throw corresponding to VCM pressure limits
VLTI: added 'AT Relocation' period to gather intermediate configurations available due to ATs relocation between two standard configurations (and PIONIER_3T for PIONIER with only 3 ATs)
CHARA: upgraded baseline solution (S2) due to LABAO changes
CHARA: added telescope horizons (except S1)
VLTI: refined noise parameters for AMBER P94
VLTI: added DL maximum throw per [station DL IP] corresponding to VCM pressure limits sampled at 2.5, 2.75 and 3.0 bar
VLTI: updated fixed optical path lengths, configurations to use exact ESO setup [station DL IP] and aspro switchyard
VLTI: added eso Period 94 = 93
CHARA: increased maximum elevation to 88.5 deg (above 85 deg) (tip tilt improvements) but it is dependant on seeing.
VLTI: increased optical path lengths for all delay line (100m)
CHARA: modified interferometer setup: fixed array center coordinates and station positions
NPOI: added all station positions and their fixed optical path lengths
CHARA: modified interferometer setup: fixed array center coordinates, station positions, fixed optical path lengths (removed internal, corrected air paths by air refractive index)
CHARA VEGA: modified parameters TRACKING (R), BLUE FILTER (OPEN) and RECORD (RB)
VLTI: fixed eso Period 93 = 92 but added A1-G1-K0-I1 if J3 is unavailable
DEMO: added demo interferometer (north pole)
VLTI: added eso Period 93 = 92
Updated preliminary NPOI description: no zenithal restriction + tip tilt for telescopes; use 3 characters for station names; fixed AE0 / AC0 offset estimation
Added preliminary NPOI description (tests only - missing switchyard and pops setup)
CHARA CLASSIC / CLIMB: added J band capability (filter centered at 1.2862 um with a width of 0.2780 um)
CHARA VEGA: modified resolution of R2656, R2668 and R2720 modes to have only 2 spectral channels as given by data reduction software
CHARA VEGA: modified parameters BLUE FILTER (CLOSE) and RECORD (B)
Added checksum to each configuration file to test the configuration integrity
VLTI: added eso Period 92 = 91
CHARA MIRC: fixed MIRC LOW_H mode (8 spectral channels instead of 7)
CHARA MIRC: fixed transmission for MIRC (0.25%)
Initial configuration extracted from Aspro2 package
